summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2784 for the improvement of Seventh Avenue North, from Prospect Street to the north line of Galer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for proper sewerage and drainage of said district, and including as part of said improvement the construction of an overflow sewer in Lee Street from Taylor Avenue to Dexter Avenue, as provided for by tax levy appropriations for 1911 and 1912.
